decision_conditions: Whilst some evidence has been submitted to demonstrate that the development would achieve at least a 19% improvement in CO2 emissions versus Part L of the Building Regulations, insufficient evidence has been submitted to demonstrate that internal water usage rates of no greater than 105L per person per day would be achieved.It is to be noted that the submitted information contains the following statement with regards to water usage (this is the only reference with regards to water usage)"Dwelling designed to achieve a water use target of not more than 125 Litres per person per day"You are advised to resubmit with further evidence.
